document.full_text: monday morning skate: ryan's mistake costs ducks, arnott pays quick dividends for capitals and the flyer's claude giroux scores the goal of the weekend in the n.h.l playoffs.
document.title: monday morning skate: ryan's stomp, plus/minus and plays of the weekend
